SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository

Class Agenda

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.Agenda
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Agenda extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an agenda that manages a list of Green Space Tasks (GSTasks). This class provides methods for adding, retrieving, and scheduling tasks.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      public Optional<GSTask> addEntry(GSTask selectedTaskClone, String startingDate)
      Adds a task entry to the agenda with a specified starting date.
      Parameters:
      selectedTaskClone - the task to be added
      startingDate - the starting date of the task
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the added task if successful, otherwise an empty Optional

    • getAgendaEntries

      public List<GSTask> getAgendaEntries(String email)
      Retrieves a list of agenda entries for a specified user email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      a list of tasks that are available for the specified user

    • getSelectedTask

      public GSTask getSelectedTask(int i)
      Retrieves a selected task from the free agenda entries list by its index.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the task
      Returns:
      the selected task

    • checkTeamSchedule

      public boolean checkTeamSchedule(Team selectedTeam, GSTask selectedTask)
      Checks the schedule of a team to determine if a specified task can be scheduled.
      Parameters:
      selectedTeam - the team to be checked
      selectedTask - the task to be scheduled
      Returns:
      true if the task can be scheduled for the team, otherwise false

    • assignTeam

      public Optional<GSTask> assignTeam(GSTask selectedTask, Team selectedTeam)
      Assigns a team to a specified task.
      Parameters:
      selectedTask - the task to be assigned
      selectedTeam - the team to be assigned
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the assigned task if successful, otherwise an empty Optional
